TranslateTracks(https://www.translatetracks.com) | Co-Founder, Lead Engineer (Machine Learning, Full Stack) Sep 2023 - April 2024 
 Scaled revenue from $0 to $100k during 6 months of operations. 
 Developed custom LangChain tools and agents to efficiently translate and dub videos.
 Used OpenAI's GPT-4 and GPT-3.5 models extensively for translation tasks.
 Fine-tuned llama-7b using HuggingFace's PEFT(LORA) on proprietary custom dataset for efficient text adjustment.
 Developed front-end for a comprehensive Audio-Video editor using React.
 Developed the website for TranslateTracks using NextJS that uses SSR for efficient SEO.
 Tech stack - Python, Pytorch, scikit-learn, Flask, AWS,  LangChain, HuggingFace, PEFT, OpenAI, Llama, React, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, SQL
 Detailed technical report can be found here(https://translatetracks.netlify.app/). 

 Razz App | Co-Founder, Lead Engineer (Full Stack) | iOS link(https://apps.apple.com/in/app/razz-see-who-likes-you/id6448216266) | Android link(https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jas1994.pollapp) April 2023 - July 2023 
 Scaled the app(clone of Nikita Bierâ€™s Gas App) across 6 schools in Delhi with 2.5k total users.
 Developed and deployed Android and iOS apps using React Native, Expo and Tailwind CSS. 

 Vinglabs(https://vinglabs.netlify.app/) | Co-Founder, Lead Engineer (Deep Learning, Full Stack) Dec 2020 - Mar 2023 
 Designed and Installed AI based feed recognition systems across multiple locations in India and Europe.
 Designed and developed training pipeline processing millions of images and hundreds of models.
 Designed and developed inference pipeline for fast moving applications processing 100s of objects per second running multiple models.
 Developed various in house image labeling(using active learning) and error analysis tools using React, Python.
 Tech Stack- PyTorch, Flask, AWS, Weights and Biases, TensorRT, Docker, Kubernetes, AirFlow, React, MongoDB, SQL
 Detailed technical report of the most challenging installation can be found here(https://alpla.netlify.app/). 

     TekTorch(https://www.tektorch.ai/) | Machine Learning Engineer May 2017 - Nov 2020 
 Worked with multiple clients to solve multiple machine learning problems like automating customer query resolutions using chatbots, predictive analytics on housing data etc. 
 Led the design and development of a search portal for Australian housing data. 
 Tech Stack - Python, Flask, scikit-learn, pandas, React,MongoDB, SQL. 

     Constalytics | Machine Learning Intern Sep 2017 - Jan 2018
 Worked on deriving insights from unstructured data using advanced deep learning techniques.
 Worked with graph database(Neo4j) and graph analytics to monetize unstructured data using Knowledge graphs.
 Major contributions from building an annotation tool for data labeling to presenting the product to multinational clients. 
 Tech Stack - Python, Flask, scikit-learn, Pytorch, MongoDB, Neo4j, Spacy, NLTK.
